Reviews.Title: Awesome laptop.
Reviews.Author: Cindy Gracia
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome laptop , very well built , very fast. Everything you need in a laptop . The desing is superlative and has a very useful touchscreen to make your work more pleasant . Try to buy this model in black because of the keyboard light , there is more contrast and it is easier to write .You will love this laptop and it's an excellent investment  . The screen resolution is also very good . It looks and perform like my old 1200 dls notebook , much better .

Reviews.Title: I love my laptop!
Reviews.Author: F. P. Bennet
Reviews.Content: Thank you Amazon! I really love it, the item is as described and it was delivered before the estimated time. Nice color, great design. I do not regret having bought it, also useful for college. Is a very modern computer

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for college students
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my niece who is in college, had it on my desk for a full month an tested every bit of it, though some of the parts show the cheap plastic SONY use to put on pretty much every one of its design, this laptop really looks nice and well built, I played full movies right from its multi-format CD/DVD drive, and streamed them form the web without any problem, Didn't find any problem with the WIFI network card as others might have posted before. Bluetooth, web cam, HDMI video output and battery life worked all great.

Reviews.Title: Sony messed up the wifi in its 2013 models
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: Everything is great except for one little detail. The internal wifi card has severe issues with connectivity....if you get some 4 meters away from your router the signal drops entirely. Sony's message boards are flooded with people who bought any one of sony's 2013 laptops and they are all complaining about the wifi issue. You can easily fix it with an usb wifi dongle or you could even replace the internal card...but that's not acceptable for a new product.

Reviews.Title: Sony, A nice compact unit
Reviews.Author: Donald Drudzinski
Reviews.Content: Outstanding  !!!  I actually bought it for my wife for Christmas. She likes the weight & the raised, & lighted keyboard. So far it navigates very well.

Reviews.Title: Touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Melissa S.
Reviews.Content: Like the option of using keyboard and screen. Go back and forth on that. Makes my job easier and more fun.

Reviews.Title: Internet keeps on disconnecting
Reviews.Author: Jenam21
Reviews.Content: This laptop has great features, keyboard touch, and it's appearance is beautiful (that's probably why I got it in the first place). But its looks deceived me. The second day I got the laptop, my internet stopped working for like an hour when my brother' s and sister's internet on their laptops worked perfectly fine. It kept on disconnecting and connecting for a week. I couldn't it take it anymore so I returned it. If only the internet worked, it would have been the perfect laptop for me...

Reviews.Title: Good,  not perfect
Reviews.Author: mb
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop here, on Amazon, and everything about the purchase process was great. It actually arrived a day earlier than estimated, so no complaints there. I was able to connect it to internet right away. I like the whole appearance, it's a very good looking laptop. The keyboard feels very nice and the touchscreen is very responsive. The computer is fast enough for what I do, which isn't much though. I check my emails, read some newspapers, a little bit of Facebook and sometimes watch a TV show or a movie. I also use Skype to keep in touch with my family. Which brings me to the reason I only gave it 3 stars: the internet drops off sometimes and I know it's the computer's wireless, not the actual internet. It doesn't last long, only for a minute or so, but it's enough to interrupt my calls. It's really very annoying especially considering that you pay almost $200 more than you would pay for a different brand.Update (02/01/2014): A couple of months ago, after I switched internet providers (I don't know if that's relevant), the computer's wireless dropped again and a small window opened on my screen asking me if I wanted to fix the problem. I clicked "Yes" and I've never had a problem again. I guess it was a software problem. I upgraded the rating from 3 stars to 4 stars. Also, I recently bought an iPod nano 7th generation and after not being recognized by iTunes or My Computer, one of the drivers needed to be reinstalled. Since I'm no computer guy, I had to take it to the Geek Squad and it cost me $30.00. Like I said in the title: good, not perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love my pink
Reviews.Author: Kimberley Wyatt
Reviews.Content: Laptop has everything I wanted and the color pink. I had a Sony before and loved it, hated it when something happened to it but I found another one that had the color pink

Reviews.Title: Frustrated!!!
Reviews.Author: andrea
Reviews.Content: Please do not buy laptop. It would not turn on. Charge light comes on, keyboard lights up but the screen remains white. Very frustrated needed it for school on Monday, now I have to go to library ............

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY
Reviews.Author: Ekaterine
Reviews.Content: The laptop broken, after slight fall, I wrote to seller several messages, I wanted to buy the park, which is broken, but they are ignoring my messages. Laptop broken in 5 month, I think it is not good quality laptop,` and also seller is not interested to solve this problem.

Reviews.Title: Met all my expectation
Reviews.Author: Ali, Eski
Reviews.Content: it is great laptop. Met all my expectation. Price is high, but you know that before you place your order, no regrets.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this product; Completely dissatisfied by Sony customer service
Reviews.Author: Ajay Kulkarni
Reviews.Content: The product after using for 6 months has the hinges coming off. Sent the laptop to Sony to repair since it is still under warranty. They have refused to repair for free.It is not a good product despite paying a premium price. Sony customer service also is not good.I would in future go for competitor's laptops.

Reviews.Title: the worst of the worst
Reviews.Author: Horacio Monterroso "Californian"
Reviews.Content: I recently return the one that I get. Is the worst laptop I had ever get . The hard disk was defective, the touchscreen doesn't work fine and turn off frecuently without any cause. Don't buy this junk.

Reviews.Title: Bad wifi connection
Reviews.Author: Adem Mabruk Zaid
Reviews.Content: The Wifi connection is bad. The connection drops by itself. It seems there is a problem in this version specifically because the first delivery I got from Amazon had a wifi problem. Then I replaced it with a new one and it again had the same problem

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: GAIL
Reviews.Content: This is a great computer.very easy to work.learning new great thing about it everyday.the only thing I don't like .sony doesn't have a protective plastic cover like ths spple computer.

Reviews.Title: Nice Vaio for the price
Reviews.Author: Semos
Reviews.Content: The Vaio arrived in good order. Overall, it is a good laptop. It definitely is no MacBook but it gets the job done. I will be expanding the memory to 8gb as soon as I get a chance. Windows 8 takes some getting use to, can be irritating at times... I have not experienced any issues with this computer. No WiFi problems or anything like that.

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it. Track pad could be better.
Reviews.Author: Girlygirl
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our 14 year old daughter for Christmas. She loves it. She loves the touch screen. I haven't used it but she seems to love everything about it. My husband thinks the track pad could be better. It is hard to click but I guess if you use the touch screen it is not necessary to use the track pad. My daughter likes the color but I would prefer purple. Overall, I think it is a good computer for a teen. It is not too heavy and the price point is pretty reasonable for the power it has. I wish that it came with Microsoft office and other standard programs which we now need to buy and install.

Reviews.Title: I love it.  I love it .  I love it.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: From the beautiful Pink color to the lighted keys, I just love it!It is light weighted, fast, and has everything I need!  Acid Pro and Sound Forge.  YES!I love the way the keyboard feels.I have bought lots of laptops for my business and for my home.  This is by far my FAVORITE!!!!!Thank you Sony for making this just for me!  :)

Reviews.Title: great computer -- Sony is better than the Dell I had
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: excellent computer..love the lighted keyboard...sometimes when you tap the mouse, it takes a few times before it works,,,better off using touch screen, if what you are clicking on isn't too small.

Reviews.Title: Worst computer I have ever owned
Reviews.Author: Sailorgirl222
Reviews.Content: I have owned laptops by Dell, Gateway, and Toshiba and this is by far the worst laptop I have ever owned. Started having problems day one. I was on the phone daily with Sony support for one problem or another. First, the wi-fi connection always said limited. Whether I was at home or in a public place, it had trouble picking up a connection. I have two other computers in my house and neither one of them have wi-fi problems, so I know it isn't my router. As a result, I was constantly kicked off the internet. Then I realized that none of the tiles worked. Every tile I clicked on said "app cannot be opened or app not available." Then the computer would not shut down or restart. The Sony technician gave multiple suggestions and nothing worked. Finally she told me I needed to either send the computer for repair or return it where I purchased it. I promptly returned the computer. I had the laptop 8 days and had this much trouble. My eight year old Toshiba hasn't had the first problem. Guess I'll buy another Toshiba. I will NEVER buy another Sony.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-3227U
4 GB DDR3L SDRAM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
14-Inch Touch-enabled Screen
ProductInfo.Name: Sony VAIO Fit Series SVF14213CXB 14-Inch Core i3 Touch Laptop
